text: "Middle of the Road" is a 1983 song by The Pretenders. It was taken from their third studio album Learning to Crawl. It went to number 12 in Canada, number 19 in the United States, number 28 in Belgium, number 52 in Australia and number 81 in the United Kingdom. In 1989 it was donated to Greenpeace. Category:1983 songs Category:The Pretenders songs
title: Middle of the Road (song)
